node.title: Sandra Bullock on why she's taking a break from acting
node.description: Preview: The Academy Award-winning actress also talks with "CBS Sunday Morning" about being a mother, and her new film, the comic adventure "The Lost City."
node.content: ["Academy Award-winner Sandra Bullock talks about taking a break from acting, being a mother, and her latest film, \"The Lost City,\" in a wide-ranging interview with Tracy Smith for\u00a0\"CBS Sunday Morning,\"\u00a0to be broadcast March 20 on CBS and streamed on Paramount+.\u00a0", "In the comedy \"The Lost City,\" Bullock portrays a kidnapped romance writer who, along with her book's cover model (Channing Tatum), fights her way back to civilization.\u00a0", "During the filming of the project in the Dominican Republic, Bullock said she reflected on the fact that it would be her last film for the foreseeable future.", "Click on the video player to watch a preview clip:", "Academy Award winner Sandra Bullock talks about taking a break from acting, being a mother and her latest film, \u201cThe Lost City,\u201d in an interview with @thattracysmith this #CBSSundayMorning pic.twitter.com/cHt7ENL0qG", " Sandra Bullock: \"I can be creative, I can be part of a community. But right now, work in front of the camera needs to take a pause.\"", "Tracy Smith: \"For how long?\"", "Bullock: \"I don't know. I don't know. Until I don't feel like I feel now when I'm in front of a camera.\"", "Smith: \"Which is?\"", "Bullock: \"I want to be at home. I'm not doing anyone any favors who's investing in a project if I'm saying, 'I just want to be at home.' 'Cause I was always running, I was always running to the next thing. I just want to be present and responsible for one thing.\"", "Smith: \"So, you knew shooting this movie \u2026\"", "Bullock: \"Yeah.\"", "Smith: \"This is gonna be the last one \u2026\"", "Bullock: \"Yeah.\"", "Smith: \"\u2026for a while?\"", "Bullock: \"Yeah. And I don't know what 'a while' is. I don't know what that is.\"", "To watch a trailer for \"The Lost City,\" click on the video player below: ", "The Emmy Award-winning \"Sunday Morning\" is broadcast on CBS Sundays beginning at 9 a.m. ET. \"Sunday Morning\" also\u00a0streams on the CBS News app\u00a0[beginning at 10:30 a.m. ET] and on\u00a0Paramount+, and is available on\u00a0cbs.com\u00a0and\u00a0cbsnews.com.", "Be sure to follow us at\u00a0cbssundaymorning.com, and on\u00a0Twitter,\u00a0Facebook,\u00a0Instagram,\u00a0YouTube\u00a0and\u00a0TikTok.", "\u00a0 \u00a0 \u00a0For more info:"]
